title: This H&R Block deal will have you ready to do tax season right for under $25
content:
Macworld

The time’s nearly arrived: tax season. While this time of year can be incredibly time-consuming and stressful for some, you can make tax filing a more effortless process with help from H&R Block.

H&R Block, the trusted tax expert (5-star rated on Best Buy!) already prepping to file over 20 million tax returns this year, is now only $24.97 (reg. $49).

When you download their software, you gain access to a simplified, step-by-step guide that helps you leverage deductions, locate valuable credits, and even browse a comprehensive help center that boasts over 13,000 articles on all tax-related matters.

Imagine being able to tackle up to five federal tax return e-filings smoothly with unlimited support for preparations and printings. It’s much easier to sail through tax season when you know you’ve got the backing of dedicated pros at no extra charge if an audit comes your way.

And it’s even extra easy for former TurboTax users. You can easily import your previous year’s federal and state tax return data from TurboTax in a matter of seconds, speeding you quickly toward your instantaneous refund results. 

Make tax season stress-free with H&R Block Deluxe Tax Software for just $24.97 through February 11 at 11:59 p.m. Pacific.

 

H&R Block Tax Software Deluxe Federal + State 2023 (PC/Mac Download)

Only $24.97 through Macworld

StackSocial prices subject to change.
